params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The name of the destination instance that will contain the backup copy. Values are of the form: projects/<project>/instances/<instance>.

params.name: data.backup_id
params.description: Required. The id of the backup copy. The backup_id appended to parent forms the full backup_uri of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/backups/<backup>.

params.name: data.source_backup
params.description: Required. The source backup to be copied. The source backup needs to be in READY state for it to be copied. Once CopyBackup is in progress, the source backup cannot be deleted or cleaned up on expiration until CopyBackup is finished. Values are of the form: projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/backups/<backup>.

params.name: data.expire_time
params.description: Required. The expiration time of the backup in microsecond granularity. The expiration time must be at least 6 hours and at most 366 days from the create_time of the source backup. Once the expire_time has passed, the backup is eligible to be automatically deleted by Cloud Spanner to free the resources used by the backup.

params.name: data.encryption_config
params.description: Optional. The encryption configuration used to encrypt the backup. If this field is not specified, the backup will use the same encryption configuration as the source backup by default, namely [encryption_type][google.spanner.admin.database.v1.CopyBackupEncryptionConfig.encryption_type] = USE_CONFIG_DEFAULT_OR_BACKUP_ENCRYPTION.

Values are of the form: projects/<project>/instances/<instance>.

methods.name: getExpireTime
methods.description:
Required. The expiration time of the backup in microsecond granularity.

The expiration time must be at least 6 hours and at most 366 days from the create_time of the source backup. Once the expire_time has passed, the backup is eligible to be automatically deleted by Cloud Spanner to free the resources used by the backup.
